properties.body:
NOVA SCOTIA TO BERMUDA.
26 FOOT S/V SUMMER DELIGHT, DARK BLUE AND BLACK HULL,
ONE PERSON ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
LUNENBERG (44-22N 064-19W) TO BERMUDA (32-18N 064-47W).
LAST KNOWN POSITION 43-16N 063-29W AT 011800Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO JRCC HALIFAX,
TELEX: 584331699943, PHONE: 902 427 8200,
FAX: 902 427 2114.
